I said this shit might be the realest shit I ever wrote (Ayo, let me hear that KF) Might be the realest shit I ever record, yeah (you're so lazy) Letter to my daughter I'm just tryna be your father Ayy In the back of the Rolls-Royce, you came to with your shoes on Finna cop a Rolls-Royce carseat for my newborn Baby girl, you're blessed because I know some kids in group home Ain't seen you since the week that you was born, miss you in my arms Mom be on some complicated shit so I don't see you She put the police on me, at the end of the day, it hurt you Kinda hurt me too, never let life lessons break you Evaluate the mistake and just wait on your breakthrough All for you Clover, I turned over a new leaf But I get the type of treatment that belong to a deadbeat Know that God and the universe be workin' for me Seeing you grow up from afar tends to scare me Even though shit got rough, I'm still prayin' for your mama Hope you get the chance to see my grandpa and my grandma 'Cause they getting kinda old, and grandpa been getting sick So Mariah, if you hear this, can you please complete the wish? Please, no pity for a G I know I got a daughter that I barely get to see It haven't been a couple hours, it's been since the first week And lately, I been losing sleep and it's been hard for me to eat Last time I tried to see you, went to jail on that same day Fightin' two felonies 'bout you and I got another case If I shoot in the house that you in, take my breath away I never put my hands on no woman, wasn't raised that way I wanted a child, just to have something to live for Now I'm dyin', just to see you, something that I'd kill for Tryna be a co-parent turned me to a no-parent Feeling like a transparent, what I tell your grandparents? I'd cut my feet off just to see your first steps Bad enough I wasn't in town to see your first breaths Might not hear your first words and it's hurtin' me to death Every time I try to do right, I get played to the left Never take it for granted, shit like changing your Pampers You're nothing less than a goddess, you better not lower your standards A nigga call your somethin' else, bet I correct make some progress And nothing from this situation I can say I regret Wouldn't even hit a reset, learn something life ain't teach yet The walls start to close and this room gettin' smaller Laying in this room mama designed for my daughter Playing this tune that I designed for the fathers That's good fucking hearted but distant from they toddler Read books until you go to sleep, wake up, cook you something to eat Mould you to a baby G, just like your daddy Hope that you remember me, 'cause Brylie, you my mini-me Your mama my worst enemy, I'm praying she forgive a G Tryna put me on child in need Such a big miracle in such a little girl Never let them break your spirit in this physical world 'Cause you make the diamonds shine, more unique than a pearl And I knew that you was mine from Man I'm going through the same thing right now, got two kids by a girl I used to love so much. She bi polar though, so it's hard being close to her cause she liable to spaz out. She's come at me with tasers, knives, fists,  broom sticks, jump ropes. you name it. And you know how it go, if you react everybody looking at you sideways. It hurt seeing my son covering his ears up when we'd go back and forth, and I got tired of leaving the house and sleeping in my car just to get some peace at home. On god I was faithful to her, when she got pregnant with our first son, I told her she could quit her job because I made enough to support our family, I tried my hardest to make things work, but I couldn't take it anymore.  I moved out on my own got my own place and she begged to come stay with me, apologized and said she was done with all that bullshit, but it never stopped, I broke it off with her, and she started wiling out choking a nigga pulling my hair beating me on the head and shit, she tried to grab my nuts, so I was holding her off and the force I put on her body while I was pushing her off me (she was pressed against a wall) broke the wall behind her and bruised her back up. Our kids were there, while that happened. She left and called the police, telling them that I had threatened to kill her and that I was putting my hands on her. They came and arrested me and now I'm standing trial for domestic battery and intimidation in the presence of a minor. Meanwhile she texting my phone trying to apologize, calling me every day, asking me if I still love her, while the state got a no-contact order against me. I had to ignore her. I actually ended up meeting somebody else a month after bonding out, and when she found out I had moved on, she stopped letting me or my family see the kids and started writing the prosecution and DCS telling them that I was a terrible father and all kinds of crazy stuff. This my first ever criminal charge, but because of the shit she saying to them, they're tryna give me 3 years in prison, all over something I never even did. I got disqualified from my job and nobody is tryna hire me right now, because of the felony arrest on my record.  She was attacking me completely unprovoked, I was trying to break things off with her, I've been in both of my kid's lives since they was first born, I bought them all their clothes and food and like I said, been the sole breadwinner for my family for years. But because of this case, I haven't seen them for 8 months now. It's killing me because my daughter was a newborn when all this shit went down. My grand ma died last year and she never got to meet my daughter because of this shit. I'm fighting for my freedom and baby mama not trying to let me live my life if it ain't with her, and the kids are the one's who suffer the most from all of this. This song, got me in my feelings because I feel every damn word. This song make me feel like it's people out here that understand what it's like, cause it's fucked up. I'm praying that everything's gonna work out, and I can be free to live my life and see my kids again, because I miss them so much!

Please, no pity for a G I know I got a daughter that I barely get to see It haven't been a couple hours, it's been since the first week And lately, I been losing sleep and it's been hard for me to eat Last time I tried to see you, went to jail on that same day Fightin' two felonies 'bout you and I got another case If I shoot in the house that you in, take my breath away I never put my hands on no woman, wasn't raised that way I wanted a child, just to have something to live for Now I'm dyin', just to see you, something that I'd kill for Tryna be a co-parent turned me to a no-parent Feeling like a transparent, what I tell your grandparents? I'd cut my feet off just to see your first steps Bad enough I wasn't in town to see your first breaths Might not hear your first words and it's hurtin' me to death Every time I try to do right, I get hours, it's been since the first week And lately, I been losing sleep and it's been hard for me to eat I can't really call it pain 'cause I know this shit a process God give us challenges and see us make some progress And nothing from this situation I can say I regret Wouldn't even hit a reset, learn something life ain't teach yet The walls start to close and this room gettin' smaller Laying in this room mama designed for my daughter Playing this tune that I designed for the fathers That's good fucking hearted but distant from they toddler Read books until you go to sleep, wake up, cook you something to eat Mould you to a baby G, just like your daddy Hope that you remember me, 'cause Brylie, you my mini-me Your mama my worst enemy, I'm praying she forgive a G Tryna put me on child in need Such a big miracle in such a little girl Never let them break your spirit in this physical world 'Cause you make the diamonds shine, more unique than a pearl And I knew that you was mine from your smile and your curls Letter to my daughter I'm just tryna be your father Letter to my daughter Please, no pity for a G I know I got a daughter that I barely get to see It haven't been a couple This song hit hard, especially since I delt with some of this shit after me and my BM split apart a few years ago. Glad I got custody, was worth the fight to get my little man back into my arms. I hope and pray to all the amazing fathers out there wanting to be apart of a childs life that everything works in your favor, keep your head up and don't give up. It may be a whole process just to see them again, might cost money to battle but in the end it'll all work out if your intentions are genuine.  As for the moms out there, if a father wants to be involved don't push them away its hurting the child the most. Finding a man that wants to be involved with that child for the rest of their lives is very rare, I agree some guys are dead beats and don't deserve to be a father or just don't want to be, but at the same time nothing will change a true man like getting to hold that angel in his arms. Just as a child saved or changed your life for the better, its the same for a man it isn't a 1way street. Just cause your a mother now doesn't mean you know whats best for that child, youll learn that when they grow up giving you a cold shoulder cause their daddy wasn't allowed to be involved cause you let your pride and feelings get in the way just cause you wanna be with another guy or whatever.

NOW LOOK AT WORDS KILL IT 1ST MONTH 14 DAY OF THE CURSE OF TIME 4.14 PI PY PY KILL IT THE EVENING ESSENTIALLY MIDNIGHT IEYE WILL SHOW YOU WHERE THAT IS CLARIFIED IN VERSE 29 2+9=11 NOW VERSE 11 11Â And thus shall ye eat it; with your loins girded, your shoes on your feet, and your staff in your hand; and ye shall eat it in haste: it is theÂ Lord's passover. EAT THE SACRIFICE TAKE UP YOUR STAFF AND STAFF IS SYMBOLISM OF SORCERY LIKE IN ALADDIN THE EVIL SORCERER HAD A STAFF NOW VERSE 29 THE CURSES OF DEATH ON LIFE AND WHAT TIME THEY KILL THEIR BLOOD SACRIFICE 29Â And it came to pass, that at midnight theÂ LordÂ smote all the firstborn in the land of Egypt, from the firstborn of Pharaoh that sat on his throne unto the firstborn of the captive that was in the dungeon; and all the firstborn of cattle. Jesus died for your sins on the cross. He took the punishment you deserve, and He rose again on the 3rd day.
